title: Jabra logo straight-sided spurless sans w/ rounded corners
content:
Hello,

does anybody know the font of the Jabra identity?  
Here is the link to:

[http://www.artotel.com.pl/Jabra\_logo\_white.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140312045424/http:/www.artotel.com.pl/Jabra_logo_white.jpg "http://www.artotel.com.pl/Jabra\_logo\_white.jpg")

Thanks a lot.

Wadim Kahlkopf
author: Wadim Kahlkopf

comments.content:
Looks like it was constructed with ellipses and straight lines which could indicate that it's custom or free.

- Lex
